meanings.definition: Investigates and solves problems in a system or process.
meanings.sent1: She troubleshoots the computer to find out why it won't turn on.
meanings.sent2: The IT specialist troubleshoots network issues to keep the office running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The detective troubleshoots the mystery of the missing cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: His logical thinking troubleshoots through the complex puzzle effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic troubleshoots the engine problem with precision and skill.

meanings.definition: Identifies and resolves issues or difficulties.
meanings.sent1: He troubleshoots the leaky faucet by tightening the pipe.
meanings.sent2: The customer service representative troubleshoots complaints to ensure customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: The chef troubleshoots the bland soup by adding more seasoning.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking troubleshoots the sudden power outage in the building.
meanings.sent5: The teacher troubleshoots student misunderstandings with patience and clarity.

meanings.definition: Engages in problem-solving to fix malfunctions or errors.
meanings.sent1: The electrician troubleshoots the faulty wiring to prevent a fire.
meanings.sent2: The software engineer troubleshoots bugs in the code to improve performance.
meanings.sent3: The plumber troubleshoots the clogged drain with a specialized tool.
meanings.sent4: His expertise troubleshoots the technical glitch in the system effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The scientist troubleshoots the experiment to ensure accurate results.
